faqs.name: FAQs
faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.text: Here are some of the most frequently asked questions about our product.

features.name: Features
features.title: Unlock Infinite Possibilities with Creativity
features.text: Our platform offers a variety of features designed to enhance your content creation experience. From intuitive text editing tools to powerful hand-drawn style sketching, we provide everything you need to bring your ideas to life. Whether you're writing articles, designing sketches, or creating visually rich presentations, DrawText meets all your needs, making creative expression more free and intuitive.

hero.title1: Try a Whole New Way of Creating
hero.title3: From text to sketches, our tools bring your ideas to life. Easily edit, draw, and share your creations.

account.title: Account settings
account.desc: Manage your account settings and preferences.

accountForm.name: Profile
accountForm.emailDesc: Your email address is used for sign in add communication.

changePassword.name: Change Password
changePassword.desc: Enter your new password below to change/update your password.
changePassword.passwordDesc: Enter a strong password that meets the requirements above.
changePassword.confirmPasswordDesc: Re-enter your new password to confirm.
changePassword.info: Make sure to remember your new password or store it securely.
changePassword.passwordMessage: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
changePassword.passwordRegex: Password must contain 8 characters,1 uppercase letter,1 lowercase letter,1 number and 1 special character.
